## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-13.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-13.5, 23.5) [Status: NOT_CONNECTED]
- Boiler at position (-10.5, 21.0) [Status: NOT_CONNECTED]
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) [Status: WORKING]

### Pipe Network
Consists of the following pipe groups:
- Pipe group at position (-4.5, 16.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-9.5, 23.5) [Status: FULL_OUTPUT]
- Pipe group at position (-7.5, 24.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-4.5, 24.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-5.5, 16.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-10.5, 22.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-10.5, 23.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-7.5, 23.5) [Status: EMPTY]
- Pipe group at position (-5.5, 24.5) [Status: EMPTY]

### Electricity Network
- Electricity group at position (-3.67, 20.21) [Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK]

### Stone Furnace at Position (0.0, 0.0)
- Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Placing Pipes
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before placing a pipe-to-ground. Verify the target location is clear of obstructions.
- Avoid placing pipe-to-ground where the entity footprint overlaps water. Choose a different location that is suitable for placement.
- Maintain an adequate inventory of pipes before attempting to place them. Ensure you have the necessary items in your inventory.

### Connection Failures
- Verify that the underground pipes are correctly aligned and within connection range to ensure successful connections between them.

### Electricity Network Issues
- Ensure that all electricity-related entities are properly connected to the electric network to avoid the NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK status.
